Quickstride looks around and reloads his cannon.

" Well that worked but th=
ere's still a long way ta go.  Time ta reload and keep shooting.  Sheesh, t=
hey even come outa the woodwork."

In the mean time Tucson could now see Ma=
gmatrons body mass and could see that although heavily armored and powerful=
, it had to be difficult for him to remain agile in that form.  Agility was=
 the key in this battle and perhaps the traditional battle of bruit force w=
as not the trick against Magmatron.  And without saying anything at all, Tu=
cson becomes very springy on his feet and manages to elude his fire by adop=
ting a very spring like vault to his step, even on two legs.  His body move=
s as fluidly as that of a gymnast , as he performs a series of complex flip=
s in beast form, while his tail follows as a rudder, to balance him in mid =
air. Yet the blast does catch the very tip of his tail, as he extinguishes =
the flame with a short shake at the tip.

And then he wondered, what if he =
could get Magmatron to be buried by his own fire power, rather than wasting=
 his own energy to do it?  He raises a brow with a coy smirk.

As Straights=
hot moves out of the way of where Saberback once stood, but replaced by a g=
iant boulder, she could now see Tucson facing Magmatron but is swift to cat=
ch onto what he was about  to do .  

" If he's gonna do what I think he's =
gonna do, he needs something ta dance to.  Ohh I hope my on board radio sti=
ll works...  "

She checks for a signal and then, music.  Music that was of=
ten played at the Blue Diode, which is equivalent to techno music to modern=
 man.  Tucson looks out of the corner of his eye, over to his sister who gi=
ves him the thumbs up .  He nods and then his agile footwork becomes more t=
han the usual steps of combat, it evolves into full blown dance!  

" I bel=
ieve this is where we literally turn up the volume."

Quickstride looks ove=
r as does Rattrap.

" Heeeey he didn't tell us he could move like that, loo=
k at him go!  Wow!

Local artist who specializes in illustration, using tra=
ditional and digital media.  

I also specialize in hand made crafts.  Grea=
t for any occasion!  

Need a great gift idea that is original?  No problem=
!  Email me at this address and we will talk.
